verses.verse: Now it came<WH1961> to pass in the fourteenth<WH702> <WH6240> year<WH8141> of king<WH4428> Hezekiah,<WH2396> that Sennacherib<WH5576> king<WH4428> of Assyria<WH804> came<WH5927> up against<WH5921> all<WH3605> the defended<WH1219> cities<WH5892> of Judah,<WH3063> and took<WH8610> them.

But if you say<WH559> to me, We trust<WH982> in the LORD<WH3068> our God:<WH430> is it not he, whose<WH834> <WH853> high<WH1116> places and whose<WH853> altars<WH4196> Hezekiah<WH2396> has taken<WH5493> away,<WH5493> and said<WH559> to Judah<WH3063> and to Jerusalem,<WH3389> You shall worship<WH7812> before<WH6440> this<WH2088> altar?<WH4196>

Beware lest<WH6435> Hezekiah<WH2396> persuade<WH5496> you, saying,<WH559> the LORD<WH3068> will deliver<WH5337> us. Has any<WH376> of the gods<WH430> of the nations<WH1471> delivered<WH5337> his land<WH776> out of the hand<WH3027> of the king<WH4428> of Assyria?<WH804>
